description: Huns are a cavalry-focused civilization that excels in mobility and raiding.
dark_age: Start with 4 villagers and a scout.
Build a barracks near the enemy base and produce 5-6 scouts to raid enemy villagers.
Send 2 villagers to build a second town center near resources.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 20-22 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 150-200 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 1-2 to wood, and 1-2 to gold.
feudal_age: Produce scouts and transition into light cavalry production.
Build a blacksmith and market to upgrade cavalry and sell excess resources for gold.
Advance to Castle Age at around 27-29 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 600-800 wood, and 500-600 gold at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 5-6 to wood, and 3-4 to gold.
castle_age: Produce knights and transition into cavalier and paladin production.
Build a siege workshop and produce battering rams and trebuchets to destroy buildings.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 34-36 minutes with 1000 food and 1000 gold.
Have around 3000-3500 food, 2000-2500 wood, and 1200-1500 gold at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 10-12 to wood, and 8-10 to gold.
imperial_age: Train elite magyar huszars and transition into heavy cavalry archer production.
Use battering rams and trebuchets to destroy buildings and open up paths for raids.
Research the unique technology, Atheism, to weaken enemy monks.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, and 16-20 to gold.
